item.title: Error and warning preprocessor directives
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop There are a number of C# directives which can be used to instruct the compiler to generate user-defined errors and warnings as well as control line information: #error #warning #line #error The #error directive can be used to generate a compiler error with a specific message.
